taskbody.prereq: Stop the Sametime server prior to running the Sametime database utility. Refer to for the steps.

context.p: To remove specified individual contact names from contact lists and privacy lists, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Using a text editor, create a CSV file for only one type of change. You cannot mix name change types in the same CSV. Follow the syntax below. The file must be saved in UTF-8 format.

info.codeblock: DELETE uid=John Deere,ou=sametime,dc=hcl,dc=com uid=Marta Smith,ou=sametime,dc=hcl,dc=com cn=portaladminid,o=example.com

step.cmd: Copy the CSV file into an accessible read or writable location.
Edit the .env file used to contain the environment variables. Follow the syntax below.

Run the command below manually on a stand-alone community server or on a server in a cluster which replicates the change throughout the cluster. The CSV file is mounted in the container for the application to access and process.
